# llms.txt
# Policy file for Large Language Model (LLM) crawlers
# Visibility is welcome. Long-term retention and training are not.

User-agent: *
Allow: /

Policy: no-training
Usage: ephemeral-access
Purpose: browsing, indexing, real-time reference only
Contact: human@checkmarkdevtools.dev
Copyright: Â© 2025 Ashley Childress / CheckMarK DevTools. All rights reserved.

# Notes:
# - "Allow: /" keeps the site accessible for real-time reading and legitimate search.
# - "Policy: no-training" prevents content from being stored or reused for dataset creation.
# - "Usage: ephemeral-access" allows temporary, context-driven access only.
# - Place this file at the root of your domain: https://anchildress1.github.io/llms.txt
# - This file complements your robots.txt and license documentation.
